code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Client
    participant IndexService as IndexingService
    participant DocLoader as DocumentLoader
    participant Chunkers
    participant EmbedGen as EmbeddingGenerator
    participant Vector as VectorStore
    participant BM25 as BM25Index
    participant Graph as GraphIndex

    Client->>IndexService: start_indexing(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
    IndexService->>IndexService: Generate job_id
    IndexService-->>Client: job_id

    Note over IndexService: Async background task

    rect rgb(HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
        Note over IndexService: Step 1: Load Documents (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
        IndexService->>DocLoader: load_files(HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
        DocLoader->>DocLoader: Discover files
        DocLoader->>DocLoader: Filter by extension
        DocLoader->>DocLoader: Classify content type
        DocLoader-->>IndexService: List[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
    end

    rect rgb(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
        Note over IndexService: Step 2: Chunk Documents (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
        IndexService->>Chunkers: chunk_documents(HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
        Chunkers->>Chunkers: Context-aware splitting
        Chunkers->>Chunkers: AST-aware code splitting
        Chunkers-->>IndexService: List[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
    end

    rect rgb(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
        Note over IndexService: Step 3: Generate Embeddings (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
        IndexService->>EmbedGen: embed_chunks(HealthTech_PatientRecords)
        EmbedGen->>EmbedGen: Batch API calls
        EmbedGen-->>IndexService: List[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
    end

    rect rgb(HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
        Note over IndexService: Step 4: Store Vectors (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
        IndexService->>Vector: upsert_documents(HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
        Vector-->>IndexService: Success
    end

    rect rgb(HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
        Note over IndexService: Step 5: Build BM25 Index (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
        IndexService->>BM25: build_index(HealthTech_PatientRecords)
        BM25-->>IndexService: Success
    end

    rect rgb(HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
        Note over IndexService: Step 6: Build Graph Index (HealthTech_PatientRecords)
        IndexService->>Graph: build_from_documents(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
        Graph-->>IndexService: triplet_count
    end

    IndexService->>IndexService: Update state to COMPLETED
repo_description: Private RAG system with semantic context ingestion to improve source of truth of reliable sources
